text: Shirley Weber (n√©e Nash; born September 20, 1948) is an American academic and politician. she is the first African American to serve as secretary of state. Weber was sworn in on January 29, 2021, having been confirmed unanimously by the state senate the day before. As secretary of state, Weber played a central role in administering the 2021 California gubernatorial recall election that targeted Newsom. == References == Category:American politicians
title: Shirley Weber
